featured.text: Over the course of the morning, the innovative discussion process 14 a new form of collective effort that transformed the depth, scope, and quality of their discussion.

definition.zh_def: 集體的，涉及一群人的或事物的。
definition.en_def: Relating to a group of individuals or things considered as a whole.
definition.example: The collective effort of the team led to a successful project.
